snippet.title: When The Night Comes Official Trailer (2018)
snippet.description:
*COMING OCTOBER 2018!*

When The Night Comes is an upcoming fantasy otome game with supernatural elements.

You are a Hunter, and you’ve been called to the quiet town of Lunaris to assist the local Enforcers with an investigation into a series of increasingly unsettling murders.

Immerse yourself in the world of Witches, Vampires, Demons and Lycans as you slowly unravel the mystery that lies deep within the roots of the town.

The question is, are the creatures of the night the ones you should really be afraid of? 

Available for download soon: 
https://whenthenightcomes.itch.io/

Check out our FAQ page and/or follow us: http://whenthenightcomesgame.tumblr.com/faq
http://www.twitter.com/WTNCgame
http://www.instagram.com/WTNCgame

Merch store:
http://wtncgame.bigcartel.com

_______________________________

Song: VΛNTE - Oblivion
Link: https://youtu.be/2Ni9xWmBvNo
Music provided by FreeMusicWave.
